All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AllureStepHelper
Utility class for managing test metadata and attaching logs to Allure reports.
BaseQuest
Base test class providing foundational test setup and utilities.
BaseQuest.DefaultStorage
Provides static utility methods for retrieving stored test data.
BaseQuestSequential
Base test class for sequential test execution.
ClassLevelHook
Marker interface for fluent service classes.
Craft
Annotation for injecting test data into test method parameters.
Craftsman
JUnit 5 ParameterResolver for injecting test data using the @Craft annotation.
CustomAllureListener
Custom Allure listener for managing structured Allure steps and test lifecycle.
CustomAllureListener.StatusType
Enumeration for defining different step status types in Allure reporting.
CustomSoftAssertion
Custom extension of SoftAssertions with enhanced post-error handling capabilities.
DataExtractor<T>
Defines a contract for extracting typed data from a raw object retrieved from storage.
DataExtractorImpl<T>
A concrete implementation of DataExtractor for extracting typed data from a raw object.
DataExtractorsTest
Provides utility methods for creating DataExtractor instances that retrieve static test data from the framework's storage.
DataForge<T extends Enum<T>>
Defines a contract for dynamically generating test data within the framework.
DataRipper<T extends Enum<T>>
Defines a contract for cleaning up test data after execution.
DecoratorsFactory
Factory for creating and caching decorated instances of objects.
Epilogue
JUnit 5 AfterTestExecutionCallback extension for logging test outcomes and attaching logs to Allure reports.
FluentChain
Defines a fluent execution chain for service interactions.
FluentService
Provides a base implementation for fluent service interactions.
FluentServiceDecorator
A decorator for FluentService, enabling extended functionality.
FrameworkAdapter
Annotation for defining a framework adapter that configures base packages for test execution.
FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer
A custom Spring ContextCustomizer that scans additional base packages for Spring components.
FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizerFactory
A factory for creating ContextCustomizer instances based on @FrameworkAdapter annotations.
FrameworkConfig
Configuration interface for loading framework settings.
FrameworkConfigHolder
Singleton holder for accessing the framework configuration.
HookExecution
Specifies the timing for hook execution relative to the test lifecycle.
HookExecutionException
Exception thrown when a hook (e.g., DbHook, ApiHook) fails during execution.
Initiator
JUnit 5 InvocationInterceptor extension that processes pre-test setup for test methods annotated with @PreQuest.
Journey
Defines a pre-test setup step ("journey") to be executed before the test runs.
JourneyData
Defines test data to be used within a pre-test setup journey.
Late<T>
Represents a deferred or lazy evaluation of an object.
LogQuest
Provides structured logging utilities for test execution.
ObjectFormatter
Utility class for formatting objects and their fields into various string representations.
Odyssey
Meta-annotation for managing the test execution lifecycle.
Oracle
JUnit 5 ParameterResolver extension for injecting a Quest instance into test methods, handling static test data provisioning via @TestStaticData.
PreQuest
Defines a set of pre-test setup steps ("journeys") to be executed before the test runs.
PreQuestJourney<T extends Enum<T>>
Defines a contract for pre-test setup operations that need to be executed before a test method runs.
Prologue
JUnit 5 BeforeTestExecutionCallback extension that logs test execution start details.
PropertiesUtil
Utility class for loading and applying system-level properties from the classpath.
Quest
Manages the execution flow and data storage for test scenarios.
QuestFactory
Factory responsible for creating and managing test execution instances.
QuestHolder
Provides thread-local storage for the current test execution context.
Regression
The Regression annotation is used to mark test methods or test classes as part of the regression test suite.
ResourceLoader
Utility class for loading resource files such as HTML templates.
RetryCondition<T>
Represents a condition to be checked repeatedly until it succeeds or times out.
RetryConditionImpl<T>
A concrete implementation of RetryCondition for flexible retry logic.
Ring
Marks a test service as a Spring-managed component with a prototype scope.
Ripper
Marks a test method or class for post-execution cleanup.
RipperMan
JUnit 5 AfterTestExecutionCallback extension that handles post-test execution cleanup.
ServiceInitializationException
Exception thrown when a service fails to initialize.
Services
Manages and provides access to fluent service instances.
Smoke
Marks a test or test class as part of the Smoke Test Suite.
StaticDataProvider
Defines a contract for providing static test data.
StaticTestData
Specifies a static data provider for test execution.
StaticTestDataInitializationException
Exception thrown when static test data cannot be initialized.
StepType
Defines standardized step types for structured Allure reporting.
Storage
Manages temporary storage of test data within a single test execution.
StorageKeysTest
Defines keys used for organizing test data within the storage system.
StoreKeys
Defines keys used for storing and retrieving global test execution data.
SuperQuest
Provides an enhanced test execution context by delegating core operations to an underlying Quest instance.
TestConfig
Configuration class for setting up the test execution environment.
TestContextManager
Manages the test execution context, providing utilities for storing and retrieving test-related data.
